title: Atmels CryptoAuthentication chips and Microchips
extract: Microchip's (formerly Atmel's) ATECC508A is a small IC with a cryptographic co-processor and secure, hardware-based key storage. ... Like all chips in the CryptoAuthentication family, system integration is easy due to the low pin count, low current consumption, and wide supply voltage range.5 days ago
